title.rendered: Soca vs Cocrico, Trinidad T10: Today’s Match Prediction, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
Time: 28 Feb, 10.00PM IST

Venue: Brian Lara Stadium, Trinidad and Tobago

Pitch Report

The spinners are likely to enjoy the slow conditions on offer. The average batting score is 113.

Teams

Probable XI for Soca: Leonardo Julien (wk), Keagan Simmons, Sunil Narine (c), Jason Mohammed, Ravi Rampaul, Jesse Bootan, Suraj Suepaul, Chadeon Raymond, Kashtri Singh, Andrew Rambaran, Strassark Sankar

Probable XI for Cocrico: Saiba Batoosingh, Joshua James, Anderson Mahase, Jon-Russ Jaggesar (c), Anderson Phillip, Brendon Ramdial (wk), Yannick Cariah, Hakeem Mitchell, Philton Williams, Amrit Dass, Dexter Sween

Fantasy Tips

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Players to Watch out For

We know what Sunil Narine is capable of in this format. Opening the batting, he scored 33 off 12 balls in the last game. Moreover, his mystery spin-bowling often draws mistakes from the batters.

Ravi Rampaul was slightly expensive in the last game, but his two-wicket haul, including the scalp of Kieron Pollard, proved to be decisive for his team.

Jon-Russ Jaggesar isn’t a big turner of the ball but tends to pick wickets early on in the powerplay. His 2 for 12 in two overs set up the win for Cocrico against Steelpan.

In his previous appearance, Jason Mohammed blasted a quickfire 55 off 21 balls, which included 6 sixes. For his blistering knock, he generated 59 fantasy cricket points.

Leonardo Julien is expected to open the batting and keep wickets for Soca. This dual role often helps fantasy players with handy points.

Brandon Ramdial too will keep wickets and open the batting. He scored 16 in the last game.

Joshua James bats in the middle-order and also bowls his full quota of two overs.

Philton Williams conceded 23 runs in his only over but ended up picking two important wickets against Steelpan.

Match Preview

Soca have won both their games this season and will be confident about achieving a hattrick of wins. On the other hand, Cocrico lost their opening encounter but bounced back in their last match.
